    • Constructor Detail

      • RaspberryPiCamera

        public RaspberryPiCamera()
        Makes sure "raspistill" is installed

      • RaspberryPiCamera

        public RaspberryPiCamera(boolean verbose)
        Set verbose flag and make sure "raspistill" is installed
        Parameters:
        verbose - Verbose flag for printing status information.

    • Method Detail

      • resetDefaults

        public void resetDefaults()
        Reset default raspistill parameters.

      • getImaging

        public void getImaging(java.lang.String imageFile)
        Acquire an image or imaging sequence using the raspistill program.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Name of output image file or output image file sequence. For an image sequence the file name must include "%XXd" specification where 'XX' is a number indicating size of sequence number field.

      • waitfor

        public void waitfor()
        Wait for end of image acquisition. It takes about 5 seconds to acquire an image.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Forcibly terminate the RunTime process

      • directory

        public void directory(java.lang.String directoryTree)
        Path location where images are to be placed. If the directory does not exist then one will be created.
        Parameters:
        directoryTree - Directory tree specification.

      • setWidthHeight

        public void setWidthHeight(int width,
                           int height)
        Set the width and height of the image to be acquired. Note: when setting width and height be sure to make the height/width values proportional to the 256x1944 dimensions of the camera in order to capture the entire scene.
        Parameters:
        width - Width in pixels of acquired image (1 - 2592)
        height - Height in pixels of acquired image (1 - 1944)

      • setQuality

        public void setQuality(int quality)
        Set the jpeg image quality parameter.
        Parameters:
        quality - Jpeg quality value (0-100)

      • setSharpness

        public void setSharpness(int sharpness)
        Set the sharpness level of the image.
        Parameters:
        sharpness - Image Sharpness level value (-100 - 100)

      • setContrast

        public void setContrast(int contrast)
        Set the contrast level of the image
        Parameters:
        contrast - Image contrast value (-100 to 100)

      • setBrightness

        public void setBrightness(int brightness)
        Set the brightness level of the image
        Parameters:
        brightness - Image brightness level (0 - 100)

      • setSaturation

        public void setSaturation(int saturation)
        Set the saturation level of the image
        Parameters:
        saturation - Image saturation value (-100 - 100)

      • setISO

        public void setISO(int iso)
        Set the ISO level for the image
        Parameters:
        iso - Camera ISO value (100 - 800)

      • setEV

        public void setEV(int ev)
        Set the Exposure Compensation (EV) for the image
        Parameters:
        ev - Image exposure compensation value (-10 - 10)

      • setExposureMode

        public void setExposureMode(java.lang.String exposure)
        Set exposure mode and test for valid value
        Parameters:
        exposure - Image exposure mode. Options: "auto", "night", "nightpreview", "backlight", "spotlight", "sports", "snow", "beach", "verylong", "fixedfps", "antishake", "fireworks"

      • setAwb

        public void setAwb(java.lang.String awb)
        Set automatic white balance values
        Parameters:
        awb - Automatic white balance. Options: "off", "auto", "sun", "shade:, "tungsten", "fluorescent", "incandescent", "flash", "horizon"

      • setMetering

        public void setMetering(java.lang.String metering)
        Set the metering value for determining exposure settings
        Parameters:
        metering - Exposure's metering value. Options: "average", "spot", "backlit", "matrix"

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(int rotation)
        Set the image rotation value
        Parameters:
        rotation - Rotate image in degrees. Permitted values: 0, 90, 180, 270

      • setHflip

        public void setHflip()
        Flip image horizontally

      • setVflip

        public void setVflip()
        Flip image vertically

      • setRoi

        public void setRoi(float[] roi)
        Set the roi (region of interest) values
        Parameters:
        roi - Four values specifying region of interest {start width, start height, width, height}. Values are in the range 0.0f to 1.0f.

      • setDrc

        public void setDrc(java.lang.String drc)
        Set the dynamic range compression mode
        Parameters:
        drc - Dynamic range compression. Options: "off", "low", "medium", "high"

      • setShutter

        public void setShutter(int shutter)
        Set the shutter time of the exposure in microseconds
        Parameters:
        shutter - Exposure duration in microseconds (1 - 6000000)

      • setTimeOut

        public void setTimeOut(int timeOut)
        Set the total time duration of an image sequence (milliseconds)
        Parameters:
        timeOut - Total time duration of image sequence (milliseconds)

      • setTimeLapse

        public void setTimeLapse(int timeLapse)
        Set the time between image observations (milliseconds)
        Parameters:
        timeLapse - Time between observations in an imaging sequence (milliseconds)
